column2: BRIEF-Oriental Holdings Announces Special & Final Single Tier Dividends April 27 (Reuters) - Oriental Holdings Bhd: * ANNOUNCES SPECIAL FINAL SINGLE TIER DIVIDEND OF 20 SEN PER ORDINARY SHARE FOR FY ENDED DEC 31, 2017 * ANNOUNCES FINAL SINGLE TIER DIVIDEND OF 8 SEN PER ORDINARY SHARE FOR FY ENDED DEC 31, 2017 Source text: (bit.ly/2JvDqud) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-OFG Bancorp Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.29 April 20 (Reuters) - OFG Bancorp: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.20 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY CORE NON-INTEREST INCOME OF $18.2 MILLION INCREASED 9.0% FROM 4Q17 AND 4.7% FROM YEAR AGO QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
